description: Savor the home-cooked goodness of your family's favorite recipes with Hunt's Tomato sauce. Taste the difference in pastas, meatballs, and more with Hunt's vine-ripened tomato flavors. Simmered with salt, spices, and natural seasonings, Hunt's sauces add a rich, smooth texture to recipes. No compromise, Hunt's Tomato sauce is 100% natural, with no artificial preservatives. Hunt's doesn't use sugar, corn syrup, or other sweeteners in its canned tomato sauces. Contains 33.5 oz of sauce; 20 calories per serving. Hunt's Tomatoes are picked at the peak of ripeness, because great tasting meals start with great ingredients.
latest_reviews: Is wonderful for spaghetti sauce or any tiny need tomato sauce.
